column4: hmm, this fresh install on and IP35-E mainboard needs me to pass acpi=off noapic to boot, why?
THat is required on quite a few systems, they are the first options I try when I cant get ub to install
but I am trying t figure why?  bios option?  the way the bios is programed?  really no need as I have a new Intel board coming tomorrow, just tryin to understand
I dont havbe a definitive answer on that
